About.Title: About Me
About.Description:
Hi, I’m Carlos, a full-stack web and mobile developer based in Mexico City. I specialize in building scalable, high-performance applications with clean code and a strong focus on user experience.

With experience at companies like The Home Depot, Indra, and Tich Solutions, I’ve worked on projects ranging from e-commerce platforms to enterprise systems. I’ve led frontend teams, collaborated in international environments, and built reusable, production-ready components using technologies like React, Next.js, Node.js, TypeScript, GraphQL, and SCSS.

I care deeply about code quality, performance, and design. I enjoy solving complex problems and bringing ideas to life through thoughtful, efficient, and maintainable solutions.

Let’s build something amazing together.
